content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "lily_of_the_valley", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft gray_wool, I first need to craft white_dye. White_dye can be crafted from lily_of_the_valley. Therefore I will move the lily_of_the_valley from slot 15 to the crafting grid (eg., slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "lily_of_the_valley", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: The white_dye has been crafted. Now I need to move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]

thought: To craft a gray_wool, I first need to craft a gray dye. A gray dye is made from 1 black dye and 1 white dye, and I have a black dye in slot 40 and a white dye in slot 11. So, I'll first move the white dye to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: Now, I need to move the black dye to the crafting grid as well, so I'll move it to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}]
thought: The gray dye has been crafted, so I'll move it back to the inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}]
thought: To craft gray_wool, I need to place gray_dye and white_wool in the crafting table. Therefore I will move the gray_dye from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}]

thought: Since the gray_dye has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the white_wool to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the white_wool to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "fire_charge", "quantity": 19, "index": 19}, {"type": "cod", "quantity": 43, "index": 21}, {"type": "honey_bottle", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}]
thought: Now I can craft the gray_wool by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
